titles.title: Border Security and Immigration Enforcement Act of 2017
Border Security and Immigration Enforcement Act of 2017

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to replace the diversity visa program with a new program under which an immigrant visa can be obtained by paying a fee of $1,000,000, and for other purposes.
Border Security and Immigration Enforcement Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
